main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified objects that were later evaluated as satellites occurred in Dayton, Ohio throughout May 1965.
interesting points: Witnesses described an object as a white, brighter than stars, moving rapidly in a straight line,The object changed course from South to East,Appeared to be a starlight or bright metal color,One witness noted that the object vanished by stopping and fading away,Several observers reported their experiences during different encounters over the month.
sighted object: unidentified aerial phenomena resembling satellites, including Echo I and Echo II
witness description: civilian observers, including a biology and physics teacher
